name: tfsgit-pr-injector
description: This is a reference implementation and not a supported API. This module is responsible for injecting comments to a Tts Git (i.e. VSTS, TFS on premise servers) pull request. It should be consumed from a TFS build task. The comment format is simple - content, file path, line and priority. The priority is used to limit the number of comments one can push to a PR.

scripts.pretest: npm run clean && npm run tslint && npm run compile &&  npm run test:copyData
scripts.?test: Run TSLint, compile TypeScript, run unit tests, and create coverage reports.
scripts.?test:watch: Watch for changed compiled TypeScript files and perform unit tests. Press Ctrl-Shift-B in VSCode to compile TypeScript.
scripts.?cleanall: Removes the node_modules & typings, all compiled TypeScript files, and coverage reports.
scripts.?package: Creates the task package. Don't forget to edit the task.json and bump the version number before publishing the task.
scripts.package: rimraf ./bin/package && cpx ./bin/module/**/*.js ./bin/package && cpx ./task.json ./bin/package && cpx ./icon.png ./bin/package && cpx ./package.json ./bin/package && cd bin/package && npm install --production

author: Microsoft
